# Adams Crossroads, Delaware

|postal_code_type =

Adams Crossroads is a settlement  southeast of Hickman in Sussex County, Delaware, United States. Adams Crossroads is located at the intersection of Delaware Route 404 and Adamsville Road, northwest of Bridgeville in the Northwest Fork Hundred.
See also
*Adamsville, Delaware
*Adams Home Farm
